text_block_list.text: After her outing―― Sakura Bakushin O is once again feeling down in the dumps.
She's feeling down because she's about to say goodbye to her freckle-faced classmate.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …I know that at Tracen Academy, students often leave school.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But, I believed that…! That I would be with my entire class the whole time, growing together, working hard together, and graduating together!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Even so, the day to say goodbye will come.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As class president, I'd like to do something for her in the time we have left, but――
choice_data_list: Why don't you give her a present?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ohh! That's a superb idea!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If this gift has to be a parting one, I want to make it something that stays in one's heart forever! Hmhmhm, what should it be…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: A run, you say?
The time she spent training for her last race must have been invaluable to her.
So why don't you go for one last, fun run with her? That's my suggestion――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hoho, as expected of Trainer! What a magnificent idea!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That training was a memorable time not only for her, but for me as well.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much! I'll invite her out tomorrow A.S.A.P.!
The next day, I saw Sakura Bakushin O and her freckle-faced classmate on the field.
choice_data_list: Good to see the sun is shining!
Good to see the sun is shining!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Indeed! It's a beautiful blue sky with not a single cloud to be found――ideal conditions for Bakushin-ing!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: This feels a little nostalgic, huh～. It feels like a long time ago that we both trained together!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fu-fu, I feel the same way. Then, without further ado, let's get started!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No need to go easy on me! Let's clash, without holding anything back!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Of course! I'm not gonna lose, Baku-chan!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Yes! Bakushiiiiiiiii―n!!
With smiles as bright as the sun, they started to run.
And I kept running as much as time and energy allowed.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hah, haa… That was a Nice Bakushin you did!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Baku-chan did, too. That was a really fun run we did together!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …You know, I'm really grateful to Baku-chan and Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: It's because of you two that I feel so refreshed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, where did this come from? I've told you before, have I not?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As class president, I was just doing what I was supposed to do!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hmmm… That's it?

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: But I thought I was making good friends with Baku-chan, wasn't I?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: N, no!! Of course, it's because you're my dear friend, too!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Fufu, thanks.♪ Will you continue to be my friend, from now on?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course! Even though we may be far apart, we'll still be friends!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――Forever and always!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: A song, you say?
The Uma Musume of Tracen Academy have been conveying their feelings through races and live performances.
I suggested that Sakura Bakushin O should sing a song about what she wanted to say to her and give her a live performance――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'll do that!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I am a member of the Tracen Academy. And I'm the class president, a role model for students!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's create the absolute best song with everyone from class, and give her a live performance she'll never forget!
And a day later. The gymnasium was rented out for the concert.
choice_data_list: Here, the lead singer goes in the middle.

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: O, okay! Are you sure about this? I can't believe you're doing this live for me―

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Really, really! We've all worked so hard to prepare for this!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fu-fu, thanks to you, we were able to create a spectacular song! We'll give you the best fight song the world has ever witnessed!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Come, come! The whole class is right about to begin the Bakushin Live!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: "――Let's forge on ahead～♪ Even if we're separated now～♪"

text_block_list.name: Classmates
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah!!
Sakura Bakushin O's sincere singing and the cheerful chorus of her classmates echoed in the air. But, in the end――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …Even if, we're apart.
Sakura Bakushin O choked on her words and looked away.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, I――

text_block_list.name: Classmates
text_block_list.text: "――My heart is a straight line～♪ Under the blue sky, we're connected～♪"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: E, everyone!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: (…That's right. What am I doing!? Being overcome by my own feelings, interrupting the live performance――)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: (As class president, as Sakura Bakushin O, I have to deliver this song to her…!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: "Goodbye? No, no, that's not right♪ This is advancing to the future, moving forward's…～♪"

text_block_list.name: Classmates
text_block_list.text: "Bakushin! Bakushin!"
Sakura Bakushin O managed to pull it off, and the concert went off without a hitch.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uuugh, I apologize for the shameful scene I showed you earlier.

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: You've got nothing to be sorry for! Thank you, for putting on such a wonderful show for me.

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …I'll keep running, even after I leave the academy.

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Because this farewell is "moving forward to the future's Bakushin," right?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …That's right! I hope we can run together again some day!
Thus, after a parting of ways, Sakura Bakushin O had grown up a little.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: A cheer, you say?
She's as sad to be moving away as Sakura Bakushin O is to be leaving her.
But it would only be a sad farewell if things went like this. I told her I'd send her off in good spirits――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I… see. …You're right, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Aaall right! Let's give her a cheer with all of our might!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I hope that when she thinks of Tracen Academy, it'll always bring a smile to her face…!
And then, on the day to say goodbye――

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Thanks for coming to see me off, everyone! Even Baku-chan's Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I will! The same goes for Trainer and Baku-chan, too.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …The truth is, being in the same class for the rest of our lives, and to graduate together, we can't… Uuuugh!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Baku-chan…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: However, I've made up my mind! As class president, I will send you off with a smile!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Everyone――here we go!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hurray! Hurray! Fight on!! Full Speed Ahead・Big Bakushin!!

text_block_list.name: Classmates
text_block_list.text: Hurray! Hurray! Fight on!! Full Speed Ahead・Big Bakushin!!
Sakura Bakushin O and her classmates gave a warm cheer of encouragement to their departing friend.

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I'm sad to leave you all, but I'll do my best out there!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I have to go. Take care, everyone…!
As the girl trotted towards the entrance gate, with everyone watching until they couldn't see her anymore, Sakura Bakushin O hurriedly chased after her.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――W, wait, please!! Just one more word…!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I may be far away, but I'm still your class president! Because that's the only thing that will never change…!!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I'm so glad that I'm in the same class as―I'm so glad that Baku-chan's the class president!!
This time, she was nowhere to be seen, and Sakura Bakushin O looked down sadly.
But the next moment, she looked up and turned to me.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Everyone, let's go! For her sake, we'll make a name for ourselves all over the country!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, onto the future, Bakushinbakushin!!
The sound of her cheerful voice echoed throughout the surroundings, warming the hearts of those around her.
